definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (Ph. [[דאר]]; cuneif. Du’ru KG:121 COT on Jos 17:11) city in Manasseh, on Mediterr., S. of Carmel (9 Roman miles N. of Caesarea, cf. Lag:Onom. 115, 2nd ed.149), [[דּוֹר]] Jos 12:23; [[דּוֹר וּבְנוֹתֶיהָ]] Ju Jdg 1:27, 1Ch 7:29 = ´[[דּאׁר וּב]] Jos 17:11; [[נׇפַת דּוֹר]] Jos 12:23 = [[נׇפַת דּאׁר]] 1Ki 4:11; [[נׇפוֹת דּוֹר]] Jos 11:2 (cf. [[נפה]]); mod. Ṭanṭura (Ṭorṭura) Wilson:Lands of Bible ii. 249 van de Velde:Narrat. i. 333 Bd:Pal 238 cf. Di Jos 11:2. On ([[דּוֹר]])[[עֵין־דּׂר]] v. sub [[עַיִן]].
